projects.title: SPIK - School Management
projects.description: A comprehensive school management system with intuitive dashboard design for administrators, teachers, and students.
projects.fullDescription:
School Management Dashboard offers a centralized and intuitive platform designed to streamline operations for schools of all sizes. Through this platform, admins can manage student data, monitor attendance, organize class schedules, and oversee staff activities with ease.

Teachers are empowered to track student performance, assign grades, and communicate effectively with students and parents, while students can access learning materials, view timetables, and stay updated on academic progress. With a clean interface and role-based access (Admin, Teacher, Student), the system ensures a smooth, secure, and efficient educational experience for all users.

I applied a user-centered design approach to develop a school management dashboard tailored for administrators, teachers, and students. This involved understanding academic workflows and system requirements, then utilizing UX tools such as user flows, wireframes, interactive prototypes, and mockups to transform those requirements into intuitive, role-based user experiences.

projects.title: BROWN Food Delivery App
projects.description: A mobile application for coffee and bakery delivery with 50+ screens and components, featuring seamless user experience.
projects.fullDescription:
BROWN is a comprehensive food delivery application focused on coffee and bakery items. The app features an intuitive user interface with over 50+ carefully designed screens and components.

The application includes features such as menu browsing, order customization, real-time tracking, payment integration, and user account management. Special attention was given to the user journey from discovery to delivery, ensuring a smooth and delightful experience.

The design system includes a cohesive color palette, typography, and component library that maintains consistency across all screens while providing an engaging and modern user experience.
